00025 #ifndef _LEGACYADAPTER_HPP_
00026 #define _LEGACYADAPTER_HPP_

00029 #include "MSData.hpp"
00030 #include "boost/shared_ptr.hpp"

00033 namespace pwiz {

00037 class CVTranslator;
00038 
00039 
00040 ///
00041 /// interface for legacy access to Instrument
00042 /// 
00043 /// mzXML/RAMP encode instrument information as 5 strings:
00044 /// manufacturer, model, ionisation, analyzer, detector 
00045 ///
00046 /// In mzML, the equivalent information is encoded as cvParams in
00047 /// various locations in the <instrument> element.  One important 
00048 /// difference is that the manufacturer information is implicit in 
00049 /// the CV term used to encode the model.
00050 /// 
00051 /// The "set" methods use CVTranslator to translate the string(s) to an 
00052 /// appropriate cvParam.  If no CV term can be found, the information is
00053 /// encoded as a userParam.
00054 /// 
00055 /// The "get" methods look for the cvParam first, then the userParam.
00056 ///
00057 class LegacyAdapter_Instrument
00058 {
00059     public:
00060 
00061     LegacyAdapter_Instrument(Instrument& instrument, const CVTranslator& cvTranslator);
00062 
00063     std::string manufacturer() const;
00064     std::string model() const;
00065     void manufacturerAndModel(const std::string& valueManufacturer,
00066                               const std::string& valueModel);
00067 
00068     std::string ionisation() const;
00069     void ionisation(const std::string& value);
00070 
00071     std::string analyzer() const;
00072     void analyzer(const std::string& value);
00073 
00074     std::string detector() const;
00075     void detector(const std::string& value);
00076 
00077     private:
00078     struct Impl;
00079     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00080     LegacyAdapter_Instrument(LegacyAdapter_Instrument&);
00081     LegacyAdapter_Instrument& operator=(LegacyAdapter_Instrument&);
00082 };
00083 
00084 
00085 ///
00086 /// interface for legacy access to Software
00087 ///
00088 /// mzXML:
00089 /// <software type="acquisition" name="XCalibur" version="4.20">
00090 ///
00091 /// MSData:
00092 ///   name: Software::softwareParam 
00093 ///   version: Software::softwareParamVersion
00094 ///   type: DataProcessing::processingMethods[?].userParams[?]
00095 ///
00096 /// Note: setting 'type' may create a DataProcessing object, which needs an id.
00097 /// Since the id is generated from 'name', it is an error to set 'type' before
00098 /// setting 'name'.
00099 ///
00100 class LegacyAdapter_Software
00101 {
00102     public:
00103 
00104     LegacyAdapter_Software(SoftwarePtr software, MSData& msd, const CVTranslator& cvTranslator);
00105 
00106     std::string name() const;
00107     void name(const std::string& value);
00108 
00109     std::string version() const;
00110     void version(const std::string& value);
00111 
00112     std::string type() const;
00113     void type(const std::string& value);
00114 
00115     private:
00116     struct Impl;
00117     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00118     LegacyAdapter_Software(LegacyAdapter_Software&);
00119     LegacyAdapter_Software& operator=(LegacyAdapter_Software&);
00120 };
00121

00123 } // namespace msdata
00124 } // namespace pwiz
